features.featureTitle:
Update the Motivational Life Lessons video dataset so that every video currently labeled "Coming Soon" has a real, playable YouTube URL and matching thumbnail URL. Specifically, in `frontend/src/content/mentalPerformance/motivationalLifeLessonsVideos.ts`, find every `MotivationalVideo` entry where `youtubeUrl` contains the substring `placeholder` (these are rendered as "Coming Soon" in `frontend/src/components/mentalPerformance/MotivationalVideoCard.tsx`) and, for each one, search YouTube for the correct video and replace:
- `youtubeUrl` with the real YouTube watch URL (or youtu.be URL)
- `thumbnailUrl` with the correct `https://img.youtube.com/vi/<VIDEO_ID>/maxresdefault.jpg` using the actual video ID extracted from the new URL

Do not change the existing `id` values or category tags; only replace placeholder URLs with real ones so the UI no longer blocks playback and the dialog embed works for all videos.
